|ConceptDef.helpText=Look in a prisoner's 'Prisoner' tab to set how they'll be treated.<br/><br/>You can set whether they'll be recruited, ignored or executed, whether they eat, and what kind of medical care they get.<br/><br/>Colonists with the Warden work type will interact with the prisoner.
